queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.
Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-humhub}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-humhub}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-humhub-nginx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-humhub}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-humhub-nginx}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{release-name-humhub-system-mariadb-wait}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-humhub-nginx}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{release-name-humhub-system-mariadb-wait}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-humhub}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-humhub}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-humhub}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-humhub}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-humhub-nginx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-humhub}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-humhub-nginx}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-humhub}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-redis}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-redis}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-redis}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-redis}}

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.
Container should not use secrets as environment variables
